channel.title: optional on AWS HPC Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in optional on AWS HPC Workshops

item.title: j. What do do next?
item.description: There are many things you could do next such as: generate videos of from the simulations, add lambda functions to do that for you or send you notifications once jobs are processed. Generate Videos from Simulations The results of the simulations will be exported in your S3 bucket as zip files, you can fetch them then view the RGB, segmentation and depth images. Go to your S3 bucket directly through the AWS Console or using the following codes.
